original_text: And the Lord rejected all the seed of Israel, and afflicted them, and delivered them into the hand of spoilers, until he had cast them out of his sight.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘의 온 족속을 버리사 괴롭게 하시며 노략꾼의 손에 넘기시고 마침내 그의 앞에서 쫓아내시니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord rejected all the seed of Israel
and delivered them into the hand of spoilers
until he had cast them out of his sight
